name: Espresso Martini
extra: Use cold espresso made up to 72 hours prior. This will guarantee you to have more control over the dilution of the cocktail. Freshly made espresso can lead to an over diluted cocktail because of the temperature of the espresso itself

Fine strain the cocktail inside the glass, garnish it and enjoy!

name: Queen's Park Swizzle
extra: create a float of angostura after churning & add fresh crushed ice on top of it

procedure.text: Add all the ingredients into the glass and add a big scoop of crushed ice
with a barspoon churn all the ingredients in the glass for 8 to 10 seconds
top the glass with more crushed ice, garnish it and enjoy!

name: Ramos Gin Fizz
extra: put the collins inside a freezer before starting to make the drink - add soda water at the bottom of the glass before straining the cocktail inside - pop the cocktail in the freezer to solidify the foam - after a couple of minutes slowly top it up with soda water to create an attractive head

procedure.text: Add all the ingredients into the cocktail shaker; don't add the soda water just yet
Shake hard to emulsify your foaming agent. Add fresh cubed ice to the shaker, lock it, and shake hard for 8 to 12 seconds (until it is frosty outside)
Fine strain the cocktail inside the glass, allow it to settle, garnish and enjoy!
Add all the ingredients into the mixing glass
Add fresh cubed ice to the mixing glass and stir the cocktail between 40 to 60 seconds
Strain the cocktail inside the glass, garnish and enjoy!

name: Rome with a view
extra: top the cocktail with soda water

procedure.text: Add all the ingredients into the cocktail shaker; A part from the soda water
Add fresh cubed ice to the shaker, lock it, and shake hard for 8 to 12 seconds (until it is frosty outside)
Fine strain the cocktail inside the glass, add fresh cubed ice, top with soda water, garnish and enjoy!
Add all the ingredients into the mixing glass
Add fresh cubed ice to the mixing glass and stir the cocktail between 40 to 60 seconds
Strain the cocktail inside the glass, garnish and enjoy!
Rinse the coupe with absinthe and add all the ingredients into the cocktail shaker
Add fresh cubed ice to the shaker, lock it, and shake hard for 8 to 12 seconds (until it is frosty outside)
Fine strain the cocktail inside the glass, garnish it and enjoy!

name: Sidecar
garnish: sugar the rim of half the glass

procedure.text: Add all the ingredients into the cocktail shaker
Add fresh cubed ice to the shaker, lock it, and shake hard for 8 to 12 seconds (until it is frosty outside)
Fine strain the cocktail inside the glass, garnish and enjoy!
Add all the ingredients into the cocktail shaker
Shake hard to emulsify. Add fresh cubed ice to the shaker, lock it, and shake hard for 8 to 12 seconds (until it is frosty outside)
Add fresh cubed ice to the glass, fine strain the cocktail inside the glass, garnish it and enjoy!
Add all the ingredients into the cocktail shaker
Add fresh cubed ice to the shaker, lock it, and shake hard for 8 to 12 seconds (until it is frosty outside)
Fine strain the cocktail inside the glass, add fresh cubed ice, garnish and enjoy!
Add all the ingredients into the cocktail shaker; A part from the soda water
Add fresh cubed ice to the shaker, lock it, and shake hard for 8 to 12 seconds (until it is frosty outside)
Fine strain the cocktail inside the glass, add fresh cubed ice, top with soda water, garnish and enjoy!
Add all the ingredients into the cocktail shaker
Shake hard to emulsify. Add fresh cubed ice to the shaker, lock it, and shake hard for 8 to 12 seconds (until it is frosty outside)
Add fresh cubed ice to the glass, fine strain the cocktail inside the glass, garnish it and enjoy!

name: Ti' Punch
extra: Lime heels are discs sliced deep from the side of the lime, mostly peel but with a thin layer of juice sacs still attached

procedure.text: Add all the ingredients into the glass and lightly muddle the lime discs
Add a couple of ice cubes and with a barspoon stir to combine all the ingredients in the glass for 8 to 10 seconds
Top the glass with crushed ice and enjoy!

name: Tom Collins
extra: top with club soda or any flavoured soda

procedure.text: Add all the ingredients into the cocktail shaker; A part from the ginger beer
Add fresh cubed ice to the shaker, lock it, and shake hard for 8 to 12 seconds (until it is frosty outside)
Fine strain the cocktail inside the glass, add fresh cubed ice, top with soda water, garnish and enjoy!
Add all the ingredients into the mixing glass
Add fresh cubed ice to the mixing glass and stir the cocktail between 40 to 60 seconds
Strain the cocktail inside the glass, add fresh cubed ice, garnish and enjoy!

name: Whiskey Sour
method: dry shake, shake with ice & fine strain

procedure.text: Add all the ingredients into the cocktail shaker
Shake hard to emulsify your foaming agent. Add fresh cubed ice to the shaker, lock it, and shake hard for 8 to 12 seconds (until it is frosty outside)
Fine strain the cocktail inside the glass, add fresh cubed ice, allow it to settle, garnish and enjoy!
Add all the ingredients into the glass; keep the hand-whipped cream on the side for now
Add fresh cubed ice to the glass, give it a short stir to chill and mix the ingredients together
Add more fresh cubed ice, float the hand-whipped cream on top, garnish it and enjoy!
Add all the ingredients into the glass; a part from the cranberry juice
Add fresh cubed ice to the glass, give it a short stir to chill and mix the ingredients together
Add more fresh cubed ice, pour the orange juice on top, garnish it and enjoy!
Add lime juice and your rum of choice into the glass
Add fresh cubed ice to the glass, give it a short stir to chill and mix the ingredients together
Add more fresh cubed ice, top it up with coca cola, garnish it and enjoy!

name: Tequila Sunrise
extra: pour grenadine over the ice to make it sink - add as much grenadine as you want

procedure.text: Add all the ingredients into the glass
Add fresh cubed ice to the glass, give it a short stir to chill and mix the ingredients together
Add fresh cubed ice, pour the grenadine, garnish it and enjoy!

name: Hot Rum Punch
extra: top up with boiling hot water

procedure.text: Add all the ingredients into the glass
Give a quick stir to mix the ingredients together
Top the glass with boiling hot water, garnish it and enjoy!
